website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, waterproof shower speaker that provides excellent sound quality and a long range, so you can use it even if your phone is in another room.
pros: Compatible with Siri on Apple devices
Easy to pair with your device
cons: Some users feel that maximum volume isn't loud enough

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable sound out of so small a source but...Not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Of course it won't stay mounted if you follow the directions in the included manual (and for that you'd best bring your spectacles) but nothing more. As fasteners suction cups are notoriously weak unless you know the secret of a permanent seal: a dab of petroleum jelly around the rim to make it air tight. If you truly use this only in the shower it may matter little BUT the device blinks non-stop while it is on and rather brightly at that. This gets annoying pretty quick. The listing fails to show the incredible compactness of this speaker. It's smaller than a box of baking soda even with the suction cup.
customer_reviews.author: R. SELIG

customer_reviews.title: 99 so I recommend buying one of these quick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker almost a year ago. It's been hanging in the shower ever since, coming out only long enough to charge. There are 5 people in my family, two of which are teens who have a tendency to destroy or lose all electrical/tech devices, rapidly. We all use this speaker every day and after all this time, it still works perfectly, unlike the 3 other speakers I purchased before this. When I bought this speaker it was $50 and it has been well worth the price. I see that it is now only $19.99 so I recommend buying one of these quick!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bluetooth speaker for shower or outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bluetooth speaker. It pairs easily and has great sound quality. I vouch for the 10 hour play time, your phone will need to be charged before the speaker dies. I like that is has a suction cup, it sticks securely on the tile in my shower and I also take it outside for music in the backyard and it sticks to the windows with no problem. For the price and the quality of the product, it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Melynda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect shower speaker. Pros: -The sound and loudness are way more than adequate -It is well balanced with plenty of bass -The suction is very strong and has been on without fail for 3 weeks now -The spoken prompts for "connecting", "on/off", etc are great since it doesn't have a screen. -Well made and well packaged -Excellent battery life. Haven't needed to charge it yet. And the indicator on the phone is awesome Cons (sort of): -Mic is great when shower is off, not so great when on...but I think they all would be -No led screen, but I didn't find a screen necessary
customer_reviews.author: T. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several small Bluetooth speakers, including a few that can be placed in the shower. Love them. I bought this particular one because of the separate volume control buttons. Most units incorporate the volume control into the same buttons used for song advance and if you don't hold the button down long enough, instead of changing the volume you change the song or podcast. The sound is very good. The only thing I don't know about this unit is battery life. The other similar units have had excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: The best seller! Great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this speaker but my phone stopped recognizing this Bluetooth. I contacted amazon customer support to see if there is a reset button but she couldn’t find it so she recommended I contact the seller direct. Maria gave me the answer right away and she made an arrangement to ship the replacement the same day. I got it in 2 days. I hardly write review but the customer support made this product even better.
customer_reviews.author: Y.E

customer_reviews.title: Good shower speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is pretty decent for the shower. It’s hard to hear the deeper voices in podcasts and audiobooks, but music sounds great. It took me six tries to get the suction cup to finally stay up. On the plus side, this thing still works after multiple falls! Overall I’m very happy with the speaker; it pairs easily, sounds good, and is simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is GREAT but the speaker stopped charging after only two weeks of me using it. It never got wet, so I'm not sure what happened. On the bright side, I had no issue returning it. I purchased a $15 speaker from Big Lots that I used for almost two years. The sound quality isn't as good and it doesn't hold a charge for more than done songs anymore, but at least it lasted me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonybeauty92

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter-in-Law suggested this as gift for my 10 year old grandson's birthday. It was a hit that is still a hit. Plays in shower every night. Kid sings and dances in shower. Positively loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great features, especially independent volume control
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this was the fact that it has a separate volume control from the forward/back buttons. This is important to me in a shower speaker. Most have the volume integrated into the forward/back buttons with a long hold signaling volume control. The problem is that once you hold it long enough to prevent advancing beyond the song or audio book track you are listening to, others tend to either put the volume wide open or at about half volume. In the enclosed space of a shower, being able to micro-adjust the volume is important and this speaker handles that beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keith Jones

customer_reviews.title: So generic
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. It connects and plays music, but it makes such loud awkward sounds it’s very annoying to use. Loud power on sound, loud power off sound, loud volume-changed sounds. It doesn’t support AVRCP absolute volume, which is a feature most phones have had for 8 years. Connecting 2 phones is near impossible if the other paired phone is in range with Bluetooth on; you have to turn Bluetooth off on phone 1. I’d probably give it to 2 stars because it does work ok, but I think the other reviews are fake and that’s not fair, so neither is my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: factory issue
customer_reviews.text: While I've heard great things about this, and I'm sure they're all true, my charging port came with the plastic still attached. This is obviously a factory error and not the company's fault. So, I would repurchase this again because I hear it's amazing. Between getting ready for bed or if my partner and I want to take a bath or shower together or even just a quick hop in the shower but I want to listen to music or a podcast to start my day, this seems like the greatest solution!
customer_reviews.author: Halie Noel

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing! I love it! And I'm so happy I read the reviews before I bought it. For anyone looking to use this speaker outside of a shower, bath, or bathroom setting. You will be disappointed. This speaker is designed as it states for use in a bathroom. Is is set up to match the Acoustics that come with having a child face. Bathrooms are somewhat soundproof because of insulation for water protection. As a result, you have a somewhat sealed environment in the bathroom. Again, this is not made for use outside of a bathroom setting.
customer_reviews.author: Police Maven

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. It's easy to pair with a new device (and remembers the last device it was connected to), just turn it on and search in the Bluetooth section on your phone, click the speaker name "AquaAudio" and you're good to go. It sticks easily to glass, the fridge, the washing machine, tiles in the bathroom and even on counters. The audio is good enough for a regular sized room and the battery life is decent. It can even be charged while you're using it. My only regret was not getting this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and I am really glad I invested in these speakers. This little speaker is really loud and the suction cups hold really well so make sure you place them in one permanent place. The battery life is great just make sure you’re turning them off after you’re done showering and I don’t have to recharge for at least 6 days. I use the speaker when getting ready too, the calls come in clearly the only weird thing to mention is while your phone rings the voice starts giving you the callers # one digit at a time so at first you’re confused lol.... still a Great buy may recommend replacing the voice with a ringing sound?
customer_reviews.author: Enid Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Just listen to your phone
customer_reviews.text: You can buy some pretty decent sounding speakers for not too much money these days. This is NOT even close to decent. I wanted a sturdy little speaker with a suction cup, so I took a chance. I really need to stop taking chances. The sound is poor quality. I would call it “tinny”. I turned the speaker off, and just listened to my phone for a few minutes. You could not tell the difference. I did not rate the battery life, because who could stand to listen to this speaker for more than a few minutes anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Miztevens

customer_reviews.title: Adjust expectations
customer_reviews.text: So I had a bit bigger expectations due to the reviews alone. The sound is exactly what you would expect from an online $10 speaker. It works. It’s not distorted. My huge issue is there’s nothing covering the plugin jack so if I use it IN my shower, the moisture prevents me from charging it. After drying it out in rice for a week, it charged and I put it on the toilet now which.... is worse than sitting my phone on the toilet sound quality-wise. Just adjust your expectations and keep ordering stuff online for a quarter of the price in store. 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Good sound out of a small waterproof speaker you can control your phone with.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great little speaker for the shower. It’s nice compact and easy to use. The only thing I have had an issue with it that it doesn’t always interpret your request correctly when you ask but it’s minor. Example you ask Siri to play Pandora and it can’t understand the name you said so it just plays a generic pandora station. Not sure why that happens but the sound is good and enjoyable. Not Bose quality sound in terms of range but definitely acceptable. I have bought 2 more for friends and they all love them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Cubo. The first one died after about a year's use in a steam shower. The original one stopped taking a charge; the USB slot on the original CUBO was always a little loose, and charging was hit or miss. The sound on these little speakers is terrific, and the placement of the buttons makes it easy to control in a shower. Great little speaker. Update: the speaker stopped taking a charge in mid January 2018, no power. The seller was contacted, and will be sending a replacement. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok for music (have only used it briefly for this) but I often listen to audiobooks also, and when I listen off my audible app it cuts off a word every sentence or so and it’s VERY annoying. I’ve never had this problem with any other Bluetooth devices or any other speaker of any kind so I’m sure it’s this speaker. My old shower speaker still works without skipping also. I only replaced it because the battery life now sucks. Once I determined I could pair it with my phone and music played through it I threw away the box so I can’t even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Moirdai

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great for me since it's in a shower stall. Takes about 5 secs to turn on and turns off immediately when powered off. I have not dropped it in water so can't say much about that but it has withstood the steam and hot showers. Connects easily once paired and sticks just fine to my shower stall wall. The battery life is not great for me but considering how much I use it, I guess it's okay. No issues with it since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie, MN

customer_reviews.title: Good sound that's really easy to make GREAT sound. Very impressive little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this item and its sound quality, but I have to say, even just stuck to the wall, it's pretty good, but when you find the sweet spot in your shower, in our case against right against the corner 2/3 up to the ceiling in our walk in shower, I was blown away by the sound. It's sufficient to fill the whole bathroom with AMPLE sound, and at a very respectable quality. I thought about getting another one to throw in my camping gear for a great little waterproof travel speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick but works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It's light weight and so easy to use. The sound is great too. The only downside is that it doesn't stick to my shower. I have been trying and trying. It takes me a few tries and then once I get it, I can take my shower but if I touch the buttons, it will fall off the wall. So I end up placing it on my shower rack and listening to it from there.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Kekahuna

customer_reviews.title: Works great for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This has been reliable, easy to use. The sound quality at the highest volume is a bit distorted, which probably is a function of the small size. For that reason, I prefer to use it for music rather than listening to podcasts. If the shower wasn't going, it would be good for podcasts at "regular volume." For the price, convenience... I am very happy with the purchase. The first time I used the suction cup, it fell off the wall. However, the second application has "stuck" well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is a really good unit for the price. I wanted something in my shower that I could use & control. The sound is not Bose quality but what do you expect for the price and size. I think the quality is quite good for what I need. I can not comment on the quality of the suction cup. I have it sitting on a shower caddy. Makes it easier to take out & charge. I have had no trouble with it and would recommend it and buy it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: NI had a Koehler Moxie which is a shower head with a built in speaker. Looks nice until the speaker goes out after a year. I bought a spectate shower head with this speaker. It costs much less and has better sound. On speaker volume control plus you can answer your phone with it. So far happy with it and if it does go belly up at some point not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: E Chester

customer_reviews.title: awesome little speaker
customer_reviews.text: awesome little speaker. sounds good for being so small and sealed for waterproofing and goes pretty loud, love the separate buttons for changing the song. the only things i would like to see changed are the suction cup as it has lost suction so i dont trust it anymore and when turned on, the voice is so so loud. i take off the suction cup and push the speaker into my stomach to quiet the turn-on voice until its done talking and i can turn down the volume. unfortunately, it always is loud when turned on as it resets the volume levels when turned off.
customer_reviews.author: jm112

customer_reviews.title: It died for me, too.
customer_reviews.text: Updated 5/4/2015: I initially really liked the unit (see below), but mine too died after less than six months. Original review: I've found that hearing books is harder than hearing music for me. Even though on some speakers I could hear music fine, to be able to fully understand books, there just was not enough volume. This one works for me. If you try it & it's not loud enough, look at your phone volume, because at least on an iPhone, this matters. By the way, when I first opened the package, the thing STANK. The smell abated quickly, but man it was bad initially.
customer_reviews.author: Often Disgruntled Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2 months and now when i turn it on the sound is distorted. Cant even make out any words, almost sounds like a record skipping non-stop. I know the product was cheap but two months is a pretty short time. Hardly even got the device wet. Kept it on a high shelf above my shower while showering and the only time it got a little wet is if I touched it to switch songs. Hopefully i just got a lemon. Will be trying a different brand for my next one.
customer_reviews.author: Chase C.

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for a week or so, but so far it's been outstanding. The sound quality is great, the suction cup works beautifully, it does seem to be completely waterproof (I'm using it in the shower) and I haven't had to charge it yet. I got it to replace one my husband bought me that quit charging within a few months, so hopefully this one will last longer. But so far I'm really enjoying the Gideon AquaAudio very much!
customer_reviews.author: L. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I always use it when I shower to either get pumped up in the morning or wind down after a workout/ the end of the day. Sound quality is great, it charges quickly and has a long battery life (we charge it probably once a week), and it’s durable. A few times I haven’t stuck it to the wall very well (get the suction cup a little wet before you put it on and it’ll stay in place) and it falls of and smacks the bottom of the tub. But you would never know it did by looking at the tub or the speaker. All in all super happy withy speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower speaker to jam out to!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shower speaker. Charge lasts for a few showers. The sound quality is really good, way better than the last one I had! The volume of the speaker goes pretty high, the bass of the speaker is pretty damn good for a shower speaker also. I jam out in the shower everyday because of this speaker. I bet my apartment neighbors get annoyed when I'm in the shower but oh well it's awesome! Lol I really do like this shower speaker. If you must jam out when you shower like I do and are looking for a speaker, buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Small, lightweight, good sound, and the buttons work! :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice Bluetooth speaker for the shower. It's small, lightweight, easy to connect, good sound, and the buttons work with my phone. Even taking a phone call while showering works pretty good. The suction cup seems ok so far. If you're looking for a not so expensive waterproof Bluetooth speaker, I would recommend this device!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Product Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! I charge this thing like 2-3 times a month. The suction is hard, i put it in the corner of my shower so it doesn't get wet at all, but you can literally put it anywhere that a suction cup could stick on too. I can answer calls and the person on the other line said they could hardly tell i was in the shower! Perfect gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this! My fiancé likes to listen to music in the shower and I like to watch my shows on my iPad but it’s hard to hear outside the shower. Now we can both listen to what we want!! Our shower has awful tiles that we haven’t gotten to renovating yet but I can stick it to the tub and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, suction cup is a bit weak
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Sound quality is great. Haven’t used it in the shower, I stuck it to the sink mirror for the time being. Get the suction cup wet and stick it where you want it first before putting the speaker on. The speaker fell multiple times before I let the suction cup dry and do its thing.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: A Little Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in great shape! It is splash proof, and it does work well. The only issue I have, and I rate this issue as 1 star, is that the sound quality is not as good as it is made out to be. In fact, it's not really that good at all. I listen to rock and heavy metal, and it is hard to hear the lyrics even when I have it turned all the way up in my shower, because the sound quality is not clear. Other than that, it seems to be durable. But its definetly not worth the amount of money it is selling for, unfortunatly.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Joseph VonBuskirk

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great! And it connects well to blu tooth devices and actually remembers and reconnects to them. I've had issues with other blu tooth devices where I have to pair them every time. It is definitely not the case for this one. It remembers it every single time. The battery lasts a long time. I only charge about once a week and I listen while showering and getting ready. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually take the time to write reviews for things, but this is the best shower speaker ever!!! It’s lasted me two full weeks of showers (lasting about 30-40 minutes each, oops) before I ever had to recharge it. It also has awesome sound quality and is completely waterproof. I got the black one and love it.
customer_reviews.author: HLO

customer_reviews.title: Good shower speaker at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase so far. The speaker is much easier to understand and listen to over the din of the shower than my old one, which went into the trash after I started using this one. Small, easy to pair, and more controls that actually work for volume and moving forward/back.
customer_reviews.author: ECHEZ

customer_reviews.title: nice speaker however it won't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a nice little speaker however it won't hold a charge, will only work when plugged in and them intermittently :-(. I would also like to express my disgust at then being sent a bogus "$10.00 MastercardTM reward" for posting this review. My information is worth a whole lot more than $10.00! (that little stunt deserves another 1 star)
customer_reviews.author: edwin utermohlen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shower speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. It has good volume. Is easy to pair and connect with Bluetooth. Looks nice in my shower. And has more buttons to control your music than a lot of Bluetooth speakers (power, volume up, volume down, previous track, next track, answer call). The large suction cup keeps this baby in place in the shower. It is also easy to peel off and take to other rooms with me. Charges fast, and you can use it while it is charging. Makes singing in the shower even better!
customer_reviews.author: Star Cs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there are better quality sound speakers. This one works great for its purpose. You would have to pay more for better quality, so if you are looking for an affordable, portable, water-proof speaker and are okay with normal sound quality then I would go with this one. If you are looking for high quality sound for a party or something like that and are willing to pay more then I would invest in a more high quality speaker. With that said, I keep this one in the shower and I love having it, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Has decent sound quality and it can get pretty loud too for as small as it is. Battery life seems pretty good too. All the controls work fine and i love being able to adjust the volume and change songs without getting my phone wet. It seems to stay on the wall very well, just wet the back of the suction cup and stick it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my house full of teens. Audio is not great...very "tinny". And if one of the teens forgets to disconnect from it via Bluetooth then the next teen can't connect. Results in lots of yelling from the bathroom. Battery charge lasted about 1 hour before needing another charge. When it's in use the kids seem happy...and it was affordable...but it's just ok, not great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great speake
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my teen to listen to music in the shower so we didnt have to hear it throughout the house. Love it. Small but belts out the sound and bluetooth works great! And once it is on, it doesnt constantly fall off like some others.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Broke Immediately-- Company tells me to just return it to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The portion that covers the charging port immediately broke off and could not be replaced. They give their customer service email boldly in the package asking that you reach out to them with quality concerns. I reached out and they told me to just return it... Very upset because the unit works well but I am scared to attempt to use it in the shower with the port exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for showers
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues pairing the speaker to my phone. I bought it to use in the shower. My shower is high powered and very loud. I have the speaker placed near my head in the shower. I can hear my podcasts well. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold a charge?? Fully charged until the red light went off, battery died again quickly. Very startling strange voice reads the phone number out loud when someone calls. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pick this one!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker gets loud, the suction cup is a good quality and after a week it hasn't fallen off. I fully charged it when it arrived and the battery is still going strong after a week of daily use while I shower/use the restroom. It seems to be invulnerable to water, though I happen to keep it out of a direct stream. No hassle with the bluetooth connection and it gives beeps and vocalizes "Power on/Power off" to indicate you've hit the button. Another good use would be sticking it on kitchen backsplash so you can listen to Beethoven Symphony No. 3 in C Minor whilst dicing the fleshy remains of your enemies.
customer_reviews.author: Luke B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the amount of sound this speaker produces. It was very easy to set up and I've had no issues mounting it to a glass block in my shower. In addition to using it with my phone, it's worked perfectly with my echo dot even thought it's two rooms away. The battery life is excellent and it charges quickly. The only drawback I see is that it's a bit loud on start up, but if I need to be quiet I can cup my hand over it until I lower the volume. Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker for shower
customer_reviews.text: The sound is somewhat tinny, but good enough for the shower. I like that the volume controls are on the speaker, and that The controls to change songs. I recently charged it for the first time... not because I had to, but because I wasn’t sure how much battery life was left.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery or just poor quality. One extra star for having dedicated volume buttons.
customer_reviews.text: The battery would drain about 1% per minute while being used and would need to be recharged after a couple days of very little use. I turned the speaker off at 90% charge yesterday morning and when I turned it back on in the evening it reported 70% charge. It should not have drained the battery while it was turned off. The speaker would shut itself off when it got to 20% battery remaining. All in all I got about 30 minutes of use on one charge over three days. The unit or the battery must be faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's AWESOME !!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is just great. I've had it it for over 4 years now and it's still going strong. We even had a house fire and lots of smoke/soot damage and it's still kicking. I hardly ever have to charge it and I listen to it a lot. FULL rich sound, really compact and out of the way and performs flawlessly. May be one of the best things, dollar for dollar that I've gotten off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Temple

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  But, I think mine had a glitch!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this! Strange thing happened after a couple weeks that it was no longer syncing to my iPhone. My iPhone no longer was showing Aqua audio under Bluetooth items, but some random letters. When I connected to it, I could play music, but the speakers functionality to do anything else was gone. I couldn't pause, go to the next song, or anything. If I tried to start playing from the speaker, rather than my phone, it would call my last dialed contact. I ordered a new one and am hoping for the best. When it was working, the sound was great, and it was very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Balistreri

customer_reviews.title: Battery stopped holding a charge after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Sound was okay, volume was okay. After a few months, it wouldn't regularly connect to my Echo Dot without prompting. After a few more months, it wouldn't hold a charge very long--it went from only needing to recharged every 3-4 weeks to having to be recharged every 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Darby Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Can't shower without it now!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day! I can't take a shower without it now. I used to put music outside of my shower (like playing on my phone or on the radio) and thought that was good enough until I tried this speaker. The sound is so much better when it's inside the shower with you, and I don't have to turn it up so loud to hear the lyrics (so I don't disturb my family as much, yay). I've been giving these as gifts, too!
customer_reviews.author: Book_Addict

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than the one my dog ate!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a SoundBot but it got destroyed by my dog. I decided to try this one and have not been disappointed. I like that it has separate buttons to skip/repeat songs. That was my biggest issue with the SoundBot. This also sounds better (I think). I use it in my shower and move it to my mirror for after my shower. Suction cup works well (but it does need to be wet to stick properly)
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has great sound quality (I use it to listen to podcasts in the shower) and I’ve never had problems connecting it to my phone. The battery life is decent, and it doesn’t take too long to charge fully. I have it on the same wall that my shower head is on, so it only gets a little water on it. I had a little problem getting the suction cup to stick at first, so it’s fallen from a decent height a couple of times, yet still works perfectly. I fixed the problem by just wetting the suction cup a little (even though the directions say to dry it)
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied with this item!
customer_reviews.text: Received this last week and mannn I did not expect this little speaker to have so much power. This speaker is loud af which is great for having concerts in the shower. I love how this speaker connects to your phone and you can answer calls and use Siri from the speaker. The only thing that’s a slight problem for me is the suction cup I have it stuck inside the shower and sometimes it will fall however I saw a previous review where someone suggested putting vasaline around the suction cup area then stick it on the wall and that has worked. Other than that I have no complaints. :)
customer_reviews.author: Marnice Belford

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: For get 5 starts it’s 10 to 20 starts I love this little thing!!!!!!!! I tested out watching movies with this thing it sounds like surround sound it’s freaking awesome!! Must buy
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: AquaAudio Difficulties
customer_reviews.text: When the product worked, I would give it 4 stars but now, 5 months after I purchased it, it won't re-charge and won't turn on. So I would be careful ordering this product. I think it's reliability is poor. I was going to see if the manufacturer would accept a return but there are no return instructions on my original order. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: J.J. Calabrese

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: These are average. They are fine for their size, and what they cost. I thought they would be great in shower, but between having to keep it charged and paired, I quit using them much. Also, for some reason, they are very difficult to turn off. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris_Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!! 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an awesome product!! For years I have wanted a Bluetooth shower speaker.. but was unwilling to pay more then $30, the ONLY issue is that I had clicked to get a black one..but had received a silver one. It still looked nice in my shower so I was not upset. Other than that, it was the best purchase I have made in a long time! The sound is loud and the quality is very good still! I listen to audio books and soothing music most of the time and it’s the best. The battery life is good too and it looks awesome in my shower. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Ellebrock

customer_reviews.title: Best of the three brands l’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the first one worked so well. I have bought other brands but they failed. This unit still sounds great and has good battery power. The only problem is when I use it while showering I take much longer showers when listening to my playlist.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a shower rack inside of my shower and during shower time, I will put my Bluetooth speaker on the top shelf so that it will not get wet. If I'm on the phone with someone before jumping into the shower, I will easily transfer the call to my bluetooth speaker with no issues. I've taken plenty of showers while talking to someone on the phone and they could not hear the shower running or any background noise. They were surprised when I told them I've already showered and didn't need to end our interesting conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Vonetta Potts

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Really good speaker, great quality, sounds great in the shower! You will need to make sure that it is placed on a smooth surface or you will hear it fall off in the night. It helps if you put a little Vaseline on the suction cup. Overall you won’t be disappointed if you purchase this product, it provides a clear loud sound with bass!
customer_reviews.author: The Observer

customer_reviews.title: its actually super loud. i read oher reviews to find the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriends birthday and he loves it. its actually super loud. i read oher reviews to find the best speaker for he right price and this was the best one in this price range to my knowledge, also there are alot of people saying their speakers battery stopped working after a month, if you get the warranty for only a couple bucks you wont have to worry about that! but our battery hasnt gone out
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Lost its ability to charge well.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked perfectly for one year. One charge was the equivalent to five of my slow wet shaves. And then it steadily went down to one of my shaved (about twenty minutes). Nothing else wrong but it simply won’t hold a full charge. Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven T. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Good: loud & affordable. Bad: suction cup stinks.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is about what I’d expect for a shower radio,not high fidelity for sure, but it gets loud. Plenty of volume. The suction cup is horrible, and that was why I got this style not one with a hanger. Durable enough because it fell off the tile many times and didn’t break yet. Oh well, the price is right. It lives on the tub not on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moniz

customer_reviews.title: Great for listening to music in the shower or while cleaning the restroom.
customer_reviews.text: Luv listening to tunes in the morning. I was worried about having to remove it to charge it, but we ended up connecting it a small solar panel in our window above the shower so its always charged. No need to fiddle with removing it and reinstalling it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: volume controls are good. Battery lasts quite a while
customer_reviews.text: I keep mine on the shower wall opposite the shower head. I have to tilt/lean it on a towel rack because the suction cup doesn’t work on my tiles for whatever reason. Bluetooth connects well, volume controls are good. Battery lasts quite a while. I don’t use it every single day, so I can go a few weeks between charges.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: All good. Still with the voices.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sounds great, having separate buttons for each action is great. The only downside is that it takes 3-5 seconds of holding the power button before it turns on. Then you have a loud voice about powering on and connecting (totally unnecessary and most bluetooth speakers have this issue). Connect automatically, which is wonderful. Turning it off is quick and only has a low volume chime (which is how it should be for turning it on!).
customer_reviews.author: Sam B

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Only used this twice, so do not know about battery life. Quite tired of these pushes to review when obviously I have not had the time to judge battery life. Easy to use, though, and I can hear it in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Ret

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!! Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this is fantastic! I can finally listen to music in the shower (because I could never hear my phone). I was worried the sound quality would be bad and sound "fuzzy," but the sound is clear. One charge to the battery lasts about 2-3 months with moderate use so far, and I like that it is rechargeable instead of taking actual batteries. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: 10 hrs of battery life?? NO WAY
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, way more bass than my old BT shower speaker. Suction cup is good, hasn't fallen off yet. Battery life tho is nowhere near the advertised 10 hours. Fully charged it, took it on a rafting trip and it conked out after about 30 songs. 3 mins a song average so saying 2 hrs is generous. It didn't get wet it was in a dry bag the whole time. So the 2nd half of our ride was silent.
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: Good volume, fast bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: Works well, portable so that's a plus. I bought this as a gift for my husband for his shower music. The suction cup just doesn't stick. Ever. It does connect really fast and has good volume. Just didnt serve it's purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker four months ago and it worked great! Sound was good, and the device was easy to use. However, it suddenly quit working. My phone will say it is connected to the speaker, and the speaker is fully charged, but no sound will come out. I expected this to last longer than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it every day in the shower and never had a problem with it. It tells me when it's out of battery life and I just plug it in and charge it. Lasts about a week or two before needing a new charge.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToRead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a long time for a Bluetooth speaker for the shower. This little guy is loud! It is perfect. Sticks well, charge lasts a long time. Makes showering a lot more fun.
customer_reviews.author: L. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in the shower when my family is sleeping. It works great, however, the sound when you turn it off or on is loud! If you get a phone call, holy cow! I almost jumped out of the shower it was so loud! Other than that, it works for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scuffed up/opened
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived opened and totally scuffed up. For $30 this is so unacceptable. Although the quality seems to be fine I can’t imagine it lasting long as a used device was most likely sent to me. This obviously is upsetting given the generally positive reviews for this product and my excitement to gift it to my boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great little sounding speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little Bluetooth speaker. Easy to use and interpret right out of the box. It charged up in no time, and I stuck it on the shower wall and used it the next morning. It has a great sound for such a little speaker. There were many (5?) colors to choose from, but I chose the blue. I wear glasses, but I could still see the indicators of each button. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife. She really enjoys her music while she gets ready for work. Prefers to use this in the mornings instead of the stereo in the bedroom. It's very easy to use and has been reliable so far. She has it place on a shelf in the shower area, didn't want to use the suction cup as I have read reviews of them failing and the unit falling to the floor and breaking. Placing it on the shelf works well for her and keeps the unit from falling. Now my sons want one for their bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: This little Bluetooth speaker is small but pretty loud. The suction cup is surprisingly strong
customer_reviews.text: This little Bluetooth speaker is small but pretty loud. The suction cup is surprisingly strong. I tried it out in the shower and it worked great. Cant wait to use in the summer when floating down the river.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skipping First Few Words in Each Sentence
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to listen to audiobooks in the shower, and it was skipping the first few words of every sentence. Otherwise the quality of the audio was decent, but I returned this product ultimately because I can't have it skipping several words in each sentence.
customer_reviews.author: DarkEagle215

customer_reviews.title: Short Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: The product worked reasonably well, with the exception of some intermittent audio bluetooth issues similar to ones described above. Then it just stopped connecting, and emitted some sort of two- toned repeating signal.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Todhunter

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth waterproof speaker at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little speaker! I bought this Bluetooth speaker for the shower about a year ago and it still works great! I really like that you can pair multiple devices without needing to first disconnect and “forget” whichever device was last connected to it! Highly recommend this speaker to anyone! After a year of daily use In the shower by both myself and my kids it still works perfectly, holds its charge for an extended period of time and sounds great!!
customer_reviews.author: SpazOnWalker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal
customer_reviews.text: This product has been amazing. The speaker is very loud the suction cup actually works and I even use it when we are all sitting outside on our deck. This speaker has lots of uses and glad I purchased. Don’t hesitate with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R

customer_reviews.title: Won't unpair
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker was great the first time we used it. It worked just ONE TIME. Now it won't unpair from my fiance's phone! It has become completely useless to me! I have followed the instructions to a tee, but it refuses to unpair his phone and pair mine. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Dashe

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It is loud for such a little speaker especially. So far the battery is lasting. I love it. So happy with this Purchase. I need all the music I can get in this time of quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Arciola

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Bought three of them and they’re all working great and everyone enjoys the shower longer which is a problem because the kids drive me nuts taking long shower already haha the speaker has great features and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anas Afana

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago to listen to audiobooks in the shower. It has worked perfectly since I purchased it and I rarely have to charge the battery. My only complaint is I wish the volume could go a little bit louder. So happy I decided to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. The suction cup is strong. The controls are easy to use and this thing is LOUD! Works great with my Lenovo Windows 10 desktop PC streaming about 20 feet away with the door closed also works good with my Nokia 6.1 Android 9 cell phone no issues there. Worth more then it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice unit. Phenomenal battery life
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice unit. Phenomenal battery life. Easy controls. Powerful suction cup mount. Good audio volume. So far, water resistant as promised. My only complaints are Audio quality is not the best, but acceptable for the shower.. The rubber cover for the charging port has a tether that pulled out on the first day when I was charging the speaker. It's really not an issue, though because it stays in place and sealed without it. More often that with any other speaker, I have to re-pair it with my tablet. Lastly, the website in instructions for customer assistance does not exist.
customer_reviews.author: DM Krajcer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound for such a small speaker. Doesn't stick to my tile well, but just fine on shower door. Controls are well laid out and easy to use. Chose this speaker for two reasons, reviews of sound and controls. The reviews were accurate with regards to quality of sound. Most other speakers I looked at had one button each for volume and skip/reverse tracks. This model has separate controls for volume and skipping tracks which I like. I would recommend this speaker and wouldn't hesitate to buy another. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: G. Bonetti

customer_reviews.title: Speaker works great. Good sound, battery and blue tooth
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and simple, works great. I bought for my husband to use in the shower and he actually started using it in his work truck because it is a blue tooth speaker (he stuck it to his window and he can talk hands free now) he likes it a lot , now I have to buy him another one for the shower
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked twice.
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice before it stopped playing. It would connect but in terms of sound it would only produce some staticky and stuttering noise. Back to the seller it went.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Grib

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Sticks well to the shower has great sound I think it’s the best shower Bluetooth speaker I’ve ever bought highly recommend it’s a great price! looks great buy it
customer_reviews.author: PinkTulip

customer_reviews.title: Separate volume buttons
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kind that has separate buttons for volume up/down and for forward/backward skip. Makes a world of difference. LOVE it. Have 3 in my house and just bought this one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Morgan

product_meta.title: Gideon Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Suction Cup - 10 Hours Playtime/Built-in Mic (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverAquaAudio™ Cubo Bluetooth Speaker with Strong Suction Cup for Showers, Bathroom, Pool, Boat, Car, Beach, Outdoor etc. 
Bathing and showering will never be boring ever again! With this Bluetooth speaker you can now listen to crystal clear audio streaming from any Bluetooth enabled device. You can also answer your calls from the comfort of your bath/shower. 

AMAZINGLY CRISP CRISTAL CLEAR SOUND - Amazing clarity, deep bass and super rich sound. With the hottest sound optimizer technology on planet Earth, you will get lost in the music with the wildest sound quality imaginable.

FAST & SUPER EASY CONNECTION – With the ‘Auto Pairing’ feature your device will automatically connect to the AquaAudio™ Cubo. Connects wirelessly to your smartphone, tablet or any other Bluetooth device, so you can listen to your music while in the shower, or anywhere. / New Bluetooth Technology allows you to connect wirelessly up to 50 feet away.

OPTIMIZED BUTTONS – Adjust the volume and switch song tracks directly from the Bluetooth speaker. Features separate volume controls for easy volume adjustment. Speaker doubles as a hands-free speakerphone; click the ‘Answer call’ button on the speaker and chat directly through the built-in microphone. 

LONG LIFE BATTERY & POWERFUL - Installed rechargeable battery delivers up to 10 hours of play time on a single charge. Charges fully in just 2.5 hours / Rechargeable via USB cable (included).

INCREDIBLY SLEEK DESIGN & ULTRA-PORTABLE – Modern Sleek design and features a powerful suction cup; just attach it to any flat surface, such as tiled walls, glass, etc. / Dimensions: 3 inch x 3 inch / Speaker power: 3-watts

100% Satisfaction Guarantee - Features a 1-Year Warranty. 

NOTICE:This Speaker is designed for use in wet locations BUT IT SHOULD NOT BE IMMERSED IN WATER.
feature_bullets: Amazing clarity, deep bass and super rich sound. With the hottest sound optimizer technology experience your music while in the shower like never before!

The ‘Auto Pairing’ feature connects your device automatically to the speaker. Connects wirelessly to your smartphone, tablet or any other Bluetooth device. Plus it connects to Siri. / New Bluetooth v3.0 Technology allows you to connect wirelessly up to 50 feet away.

Adjust the volume and switch song tracks directly from the Bluetooth speaker. Speaker doubles as a hands-free speakerphone; click the ‘Answer call’ button on the speaker and chat directly through the built-in microphone.
Installed rechargeable lithium-ion battery delivers up to 10 hours of playing time on a single charge. Charges fully in just 2.5 hours / Rechargeable via USB cable (included).
Modern Sleek design and features a powerful suction cup; just attach it to any flat surface, such as tiled walls, glass, etc. / Dimensions: 3 inch x 3 inch / Speaker power: 3-watts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,038 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #91 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#851 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
